Dhanwantari Vaid Mandal

Dhanwantari Vaid Mandal organizes free medical camps of Ayurvedic medicines to treat people and also to enhance the awareness about the Ayurveda and Ayurvedic medicines among the people.
Dhanwantari Vaid Mandal initiated to help people by starting the free Ayurvedic medicinal Dispensary. Many people come to treat themselves at the free dispensary regularly for their treatment. Many patients were treated which are at severe state of their diseases.
